name: Natural environments and wildlife
description: Within the Environment sub-field of Natural Sciences, this is the study of the relationships between living organisms in natural environments, with a focus on protecting nature and wildlife, including the establishment and maintenance of national parks.

name: National parks and wildlife management
description: The study and practice of managing national parks and wildlife populations to preserve their natural state and biodiversity, a key area of Natural environments and wildlife.

name: Nature conservation
description: The protection, preservation, management, or restoration of wildlife and natural resources such as forests and water, central to the study of Natural environments and wildlife.

name: Wildlife
description: The study of wild animals collectively; the native fauna of a region, particularly in the context of their conservation and management within Natural environments.
